DOC.detailed_description: Show correction anemia epoetin beta ( NeoRecormon® ) able maintain optimal dose ribavirin ( Copegus® ) . The study compare two therapeutic strategy : use non-use epoetin beta ( NeoRecormon® ) patient infect chronic hepatitis C treat combination therapy Peginterferon alfa-2a ( Pegasys® ) plus ribavirin ( Copegus® ) . The main judgement criterion : - Sustained Viral Response ( Week 72 ) - Viral Response End Treatment ( Week 48 ) - Quality life - Cumulative dose ribavirin D0-W24 W24-W48 period - Clinical biological tolerance
